skins.selfIntroduction: I formed the 27th DesDiv along with Yuugure, Shiratsuyu, and Shigure. Since I was the eldest, I suppose that made me the big sister... We got along well and worked hard throughout various campaigns, but in the end, Shigure was the only one left... Well, that's war for you~
skins.acquisition: I'm Ariake of the Hatsuharu class. Commander, pleased to meet you... Ah right, I just remembered! Is Yuugure posted here? If so, she hasn't been causing any trouble for you, has she?
skins.login: Commander, did you sleep well? We might get a bit busy today~
skins.details: Though I sometimes wish Yuugure would be a little more independent, thinking about that... feels a bit lonely.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, did you know that Shiratsuyu and Shigure technically are my sisters, considering that they were Ariake-class?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if you don't develop good lifestyle habits now, it'll come back to bite you in the rear later.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, want a bento? I'll make your portion along with Yuugure's this evening.
skins.secretaryTouch: Jeez, Yuugure, don't pull on my... Wh-what? I mistook Commander for Yuugure?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, Commander, you're not a child anymore, so please have some tact.

skins.shipDescription: Ah... So this is what it feels like to be retrofitted. I'll work harder for your sake, and for everyone in the 27th Destroyer Division~
Hope everyone enjoys the oodles of balloons I made for this party! Yeah, I'm sure the little girls will love 'em!
